title: Routes with `only`/`except` string values fail with an `ArgumentError`
body:
After [this recent change](https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/c7a547feba60fe6ad14b29aae872c5651b4fc2bd#diff-c6b72cc328125ba09ef3602696cc6d6588da43be3d1a081973ccc73bc98af12eR1183) generating routes fails with an `ArgumentError` when using `only`/`except` with string values:

```ruby
resources :posts, only: ["create"]
```

[This line](https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/c7a547feba60fe6ad14b29aae872c5651b4fc2bd#diff-c6b72cc328125ba09ef3602696cc6d6588da43be3d1a081973ccc73bc98af12eR1271) is causing the error:

```ruby
def invalid_only_except_options(options, valid_actions)
   options.values_at(:only, :except).flatten.compact.uniq - valid_actions
end
```

The values probably need to be converted to symbol first?

### Steps to reproduce

```ruby
# frozen_string_literal: true

require "bundler/inline"

gemfile(true) do
  source "https://rubygems.org"
  
  git_source(:github) { |repo| "https://github.com/#{repo}.git" }
  
  gem "rails", github: "rails/rails", branch: "main"
end

require "action_controller/railtie"

class TestApp < Rails::Application
  config.root = __dir__
  config.hosts << "example.org"
  config.secret_key_base = "secret_key_base"
  
  config.logger = Logger.new($stdout)
  Rails.logger  = config.logger
end

require "minitest/autorun"
require "rack/test"

class BugTest < Minitest::Test
  include Rack::Test::Methods
  
  def test_invalid_resources_only_option
    app.routes.draw do
      resources :posts, only: ["create"] # fails with ArgumentError: :only and :except must include only [:index, :create, :new, :show, :update, :destroy, :edit], but also included ["create"]
    end
    
    Rails.logger.info("routes: #{app.routes.routes.map { |r| r.defaults[:action] }}")
  end
  
  def test_invalid_resources_except_option
    app.routes.draw do
      resources :posts, except: ["create"]
    end
    
    Rails.logger.info("routes: #{app.routes.routes.map { |r| r.defaults[:action] }}")
  end
  
  private
  def app
    Rails.application
  end
end
```

cc @joshuay03 as commit author of the changes.
